description: The cave mouth yawns ominously before you. Something about the cave makes you want to go in, even though its definitely scary.

adventure_start.prompt:
You bravely venture deeper into the cave... 
  As you go further, you begin to hear a faint melody; 
  The sound grows louder, and you round a corner to see... 
 A large, fluffy white dog sitting on a rock, playing a flute! 
 The dog looks at you with intelligent eyes and continues to play. Do you approach the dog (enter 'approach') or quietly observe from a distance (enter 'observe')?

description:
You cautiously approach the dog, careful not to startle it. As you get closer, the dog stops playing and wags its tail. 
 
It seems friendly! 
 'Hello! I see you have decided to enter the cave. Would you like to pet me, or ask me a question?

You reach out and pet the dog. His long hair starts to fly all around the cavern. 
 'Thanks! I love pets. Since you're so nice, I'll give you this bag to get started.'
pet_dog.prompt: You got a bag of treats

item.name: bag
item.description: A bag full of dog treats; smells like meat.
